welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kendari, Indonesia! Get ready to experience the city's natural beauty, rich culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kendari has to offer.

restaurants.name: Pizza Hut
restaurants.description: Pizza Hut is a pizzeria located in Kendari.
restaurants.address: Lippo Plaza Kendari Lt. 2 (Jl. MT Haryono No. 61-63), Kendari, Sulawesi Tenggara 93117

restaurants.name: Bangi Kopi Kendari
restaurants.description: Bangi Kopi Kendari is a café located in Kendari.
restaurants.address: Jl. Sao-Sao No.183 C-D, Kendari, Sulawesi Tenggara 93111

restaurants.name: Ayam Penyet Ria Khas Ibu Ruth
restaurants.description: Ayam Penyet Ria Khas Ibu Ruth is a indonesian restaurant located in Kendari.
restaurants.address: Jl. Sao-Sao No. 243, Kendari, Sulawesi Tenggara

restaurants.name: Rock Cafe
restaurants.description: Rock Cafe is a café located in Kendari.
restaurants.address: Ahmad Yani Square Blok B No.12 (Jl. Jend. Ahmad Yani), Kendari, Sulawesi Tenggara

restaurants.name: Terrace Café
restaurants.description: Terrace Café is a café located in Kendari.
restaurants.address: Jl. Antero Hamra (Depan Plaza inn), Kendari, Sulawesi Tenggara 93117

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wolter Monginsidi Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
